metas.description: The full race card for the Centenary Novices Handicap Chase including each runner and their price.

page.content:
Centenary Novice Chase Race Card

The final race on the first day of the 2014 Cheltenham Festival is the competitive and exciting Centenary Novices Handicap Chase. Like all the handicaps at Cheltenham it will be a tough one for punters to pick over but the race card will certainly help in that regard. The card will feature each entry for the race including the form and price available for the entire field.

Centenary Novices Card
